description:
Sunraku`s attempts to farm the Crystal Scorpions for money are complicated when a giant gold scorpion enters the fray.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: La faim comme impulsion, la soif comme obsession
Sono Shoudou wa, Kiga: Sono Shuunen wa, Katsubou
The Impetus of Hunger; The Persistence of Thirst
その衝動は, 飢餓 その執念は, 渇望
